title: Cyber Voyager
description: In a neon-drenched future, a lone hacker must navigate the digital and physical worlds to uncover a corporate conspiracy that threatens to control society.

title: Ocean's Whisper
description: A marine biologist discovers a hidden, sentient ecosystem in the deep sea, but must protect it from a powerful corporation seeking to exploit its resources.

title: The Last Stand
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a small community must defend their last bastion of civilization from a ruthless warlord and his marauding army.

title: Echoes of the Past
description: A historian using new technology to view memories of the past uncovers a murder mystery that was never solved, and the killer might still be alive.

title: Starlight Comedy
description: A struggling stand-up comedian on an intergalactic cruise ship becomes the unlikely hero when the ship is taken over by alien pirates with no sense of humor.

title: The Crimson Blade
description: A disgraced samurai seeks redemption by protecting a small village from a clan of deadly ninja assassins during feudal Japan.

title: Galactic Odyssey
description: A team of explorers travels through a newly discovered wormhole to find a new home for humanity, but they encounter strange new worlds and dangerous alien species.

title: Jungle Quest
description: An adventurous archaeologist races against a rival treasure hunter to find a legendary lost city deep within the Amazon rainforest.
